message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $170. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $150 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but $170 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $160?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I've been considering my options and I believe I can secure the product from another source for $140. I'm willing to pay up to $150 if you're open to it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
